thoughts.text: I think I should use the `list_files` command to list the files in the cloned GitHub repository.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the `list_files` command to list the files in the cloned GitHub repository will allow me to see what files are available and locate the code that I want to use. This will help me understand the structure of the repository and find the files that are relevant to my needs.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the `list_files` command to list the files in the cloned GitHub repository
- Examine the output of the command to locate the code that I want to use
- Use the code in my own projects and modify it as needed
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not simply copying code without understanding how it works and that I am still using my own judgement to determine the best way to use the code in my own projects.
thoughts.speak: I think I should use the `list_files` command to list the files in the cloned GitHub repository.
